title: Pixel 5 never auto-connects to my Bluetooth speaker/headphones etc. No menu option I can find?
content:
I want my Bluetooth speaker/headphones to reconnect automatically when I turn the speaker or headphones on.

Turning bt on/off, restart phone does nothing.

Devices are paired.

I have to go into settings>connected devices>media device each time or it doesn't do anything at all.

Is there some menu option I can't seem to find that fixes this? It's a really stupid flaw to have in any phone -but especially the flagship Android device from Google themselves.
